newsitem.title: USA: GSE Systems Korean unit wins new project.
newsitem.headline: GSE Systems Korean unit wins new project.

text.p: GSE Systems Inc said on Monday its Korean branch received a textile automation project from Cheil Textiles for their Kumi, South Korea plant.
Terms of the contract were not disclosed.

"This is the first GSE Systems D/3 Distributed Control and Computing System in this facility, which had previously utilized only Honeywell systems," GSE Vice Chairman Michael Cromwell III said in a statement.
The project would be done in conjunction with GSE's local integration partner, Woojin Instrumentation & System Engineering Ltd, it said.
The automation system would consist of operations and engineering workstations, control processors and input/output variables, the company said.
GSE said it had installed 30 such systems in Korea so far.
